H0.text: Scottish artist, Sir Henry Raeburn was knighted by which British monarch in 1822. King George III

H1.text: Scottish artist, Sir Henry Raeburn was knighted by which British monarch in 1822. King William IV

H2.text: Scottish artist, Sir Henry Raeburn was knighted by which British monarch in 1822. Queen Victoria

H3.text: Scottish artist, Sir Henry Raeburn was knighted by which British monarch in 1822. George IV

A4.text: On 29 August 1822 he received a knighthood during the visit of King George IV to Scotland

A5.text: He served as Portrait Painter to King George IV in Scotland
